name: LSD: Last Second Details
description:
Are you ready to ascend to the ethereal pathways of the seven truths?  You took your acid tab 30 minutes ago and you can feel it start to come on.

Wait a second.  Did you turn on the trippy lights?  And what about all those clothes that needed to be put in the laundry basket?  And all that dirt that needs to be vacuumed?

You have less than a minute to finish your chores before your head enters the 7th reality.  Good luck.

Made in 1 week for the One Minute Jam (all games must have only 1 minute of gameplay).  

Controls: WASD or arrows to move, E to interact

Art & sound effects by me. 
Music is "Retro Action Game Theme #4 (looped)", "Retro Action Loop #4", "Retro Victory #2", and "Retro Casual Theme #7 (looped)" by Muz Station Productions.
